column1: Source: Nigeria Sexual Offender and Service Provider Database, accessed January 2023

*The service provider register is a collation of governmental, non-government, faith based,
voluntary and charitable associations/ institutions or individuals providing shelter, homes,
counseling, legal, financial, vocational, educational, psycho social, medical or other assistance
to victims and survivors of all forms of domestic and sex related violence, as captured in the
VAPP Act, that are working nationwide in Nigeria.
